import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import xgboost as xgb

# Load data
train_df = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test_df = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

# Target variable
y_train = train_df['SalePrice']
X_train = train_df.drop('SalePrice', axis=1)
X_test = test_df

# Feature engineering
X_train = X_train.copy()
X_test = X_test.copy()

# Age features
X_train['Age'] = X_train['YrSold'] - X_train['YearBuilt']
X_train['RemodAge'] = X_train['YrSold'] - X_train['YearRemodAdd']
X_test['Age'] = X_test['YrSold'] - X_test['YearBuilt']
X_test['RemodAge'] = X_test['YrSold'] - X_test['YearRemodAdd']

# Ratio features
X_train['TotalBsmtSF_per_1stFlrSF'] = X_train['TotalBsmtSF'] / (X_train['1stFlrSF'] + 1)
X_train['GrLivArea_per_1stFlrSF'] = X_train['GrLivArea'] / (X_train['1stFlrSF'] + 1)
X_train['GarageArea_per_GarageCars'] = X_train['GarageArea'] / (X_train['GarageCars'] + 1)
X_test['TotalBsmtSF_per_1stFlrSF'] = X_test['TotalBsmtSF'] / (X_test['1stFlrSF'] + 1)
X_test['GrLivArea_per_1stFlrSF'] = X_test['GrLivArea'] / (X_test['1stFlrSF'] + 1)
X_test['GarageArea_per_GarageCars'] = X_test['GarageArea'] / (X_test['GarageCars'] + 1)

X_train['BedroomAbvGr_per_KitchenAbvGr'] = X_train['BedroomAbvGr'] / (X_train['KitchenAbvGr'] + 1)
X_test['BedroomAbvGr_per_KitchenAbvGr'] = X_test['BedroomAbvGr'] / (X_test['KitchenAbvGr'] + 1)

X_train['TotalSF'] = X_train['1stFlrSF'] + X_train['2ndFlrSF'] + X_train['LowQualFinSF'] + X_train['GrLivArea'] + X_train['TotalBsmtSF']
X_test['TotalSF'] = X_test['1stFlrSF'] + X_test['2ndFlrSF'] + X_test['LowQualFinSF'] + X_test['GrLivArea'] + X_test['TotalBsmtSF']

X_train['BsmtFinSF_ratio'] = X_train['BsmtFinSF1'] / (X_train['TotalBsmtSF'] + 1)
X_test['BsmtFinSF_ratio'] = X_test['BsmtFinSF1'] / (X_test['TotalBsmtSF'] + 1)

X_train['Fireplaces_per_TotalRms'] = X_train['Fireplaces'] / (X_train['TotRmsAbvGrd'] + 1)
X_test['Fireplaces_per_TotalRms'] = X_test['Fireplaces'] / (X_test['TotRmsAbvGrd'] + 1)

import pandas as pd

# Load data
train_df = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test_df = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

# Create submission with basic structure
submission = pd.DataFrame({
    'Id': test_df['Id'],
    'SalePrice': 0
})

print("Submission saved to submission.csv")
